original_title: 『はっつ！！』マドンナ初登場！！ 「同窓会に行ってくるね…。」と出ていった妻から、もう3時間既読がつかない―。 初川みなみ
overview: Today is my wife Minami's wedding anniversary. After attending the class reunion together, I was planning to celebrate the anniversary at home, but I gave priority to a drinking party with a business partner, and I couldn't speak to Minami from the morning. And I went to a drinking party on the night that Minami went to the reunion, and I came home earlier. When I contacted the members who were attending the reunion, I heard that Sato and Minami Chidori had disappeared before the after party, and my anxiety reached its peak...
title: “Ahhh!!” Her Madonna Label Debut!! “I’m Off To My Class Reunion …” And Then, 3 Hours Later, I Noticed That My Wife Still Hadn’t Read Any Of My Text Messages … Minami Hatsukawa
